entries.journal_entry_description: Break into the slave camp control center and get the sychronize the code sequencer with the one at the base.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Gain entry to the command bunker at the Trandoshan camp.  The codes will be in a room on the second floor.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: To gain entry to the sequencer room you must disable the power.  Captain Beshk has the command codes needed to gain entry to the power room.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Now that you have the key codes gain access to the power room and shut it down.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Head back upstairs and obtain the sequencer codes from the central computer.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Take your encoded Sequencer back to Gursan Bryes to prepare for the assault on the Avatar Platform.
